thread.title: Susan Shyrock

author: Susan Shyrock
title: Susan Shyrock
text: We did a complete kitchen remodel with Loveland Design.Working with Diane and Kara was great. With a schedule of four weeks from start to finish, everything came together as planned.Even with some unexpected repairs that were encountered along the way, we could not be more pleased with the results.All of the contractors were very professional, and Larry did an outstanding job with the prep, repairs, installation and final finish work on the cabinets.
